doc: ['Spatiotemporal pattern and mechanism of street vending from the social sensing perspective : A comparison between law-enforcement reported and resident complain event .', 'Street vending is an important part of the urban informal economy , especially in developing country .', 'How to control its negative externality while augmenting its positive role in the urban socio-economic system poses challenge to urban planning and governance .', 'Existing study have insufficiently addressed the issue largely due to the lack of high-frequent observation data for street vending event .', "By introducing socially sensed big data from the smart urban governance platform , as well as record from the “ 12345 ” urban problem complaint hotline of Jiangbei District , Ningbo , China , this paper examines and compares the spatiotemporal pattern and occurrence mechanism of street vending event from both the urban manager ' “ top-down ” and the urban resident ' “ bottom-up ” point of view .", 'Statistical and machine learning model show that the distribution of street vending activity as sensed by the two subject does not overlap .', 'The former concentrate in central urban area and work time , while the latter is scattered distributed in everyday life-related place and time .', 'The finding reaffirm the existence of perception bias in social sensing data and show the potential for utilizing such bias to nudge better urban governance practice .', 'Theoretically and empirically , this research has contributed to promoting the people-oriented transformation of urban governance .', "Detecting individual ' spatial familiarity with urban environment using eye movement data .", 'The spatial familiarity of environment is an important high-level user context for location-based service ( LBS ) .', "Knowing user ' familiarity level of environment is helpful for enabling context-aware LBS that can automatically adapt information service according to user ' familiarity with the environment .", "Unlike state-of-the-art study that used questionnaire , sketch map , mobile phone positioning ( GPS ) data , and social medium data to measure spatial familiarity , this study explored the potential of a new type of sensory data - eye movement data - to infer user ' spatial familiarity of environment using a machine learning approach .", "We collected 38 participant ' eye movement data when they were performing map-based navigation task in familiar and unfamiliar urban environment .", 'We trained and cross-validated a random forest classifier to infer whether the user were familiar or unfamiliar with the environment ( i.e.', ', binary classification ) .', 'By combining basic statistical feature and fixation semantic feature , we achieved a best accuracy of 81 % in a 10-fold classification and 70 % in the leave-one-task-out ( LOTO ) classification .', "We found that the pupil diameter , fixation dispersion , saccade duration , fixation count and duration on the map were the most important feature for detecting user ' spatial familiarity .", "Our result indicate that detecting user ' spatial familiarity from eye tracking data is feasible in map-based navigation and only a few second ( e.g.", ', 5 s ) of eye movement data is sufficient for such detection .', "These result could be used to develop context-aware LBS that adapt their service to user ' familiarity with the environment .", 'Designing Data Validation Framework for Crowd-Sourced Road Monitoring Applications .', 'With the wide availability of smartphone sensing and the Internet connection , mobile crowd sourcing ( MCS ) has become a promising paradigm for collecting opinion and providing service to the citizen .', 'In the smart city context , crowd data , both in the form of their opinion and in the form of sensing data from their smartphones are very useful for scalable monitoring of resource demand and planning .', 'Since these device are portable , it is carried by almost every citizen , thus making them ubiquitous .', 'However , the main bottleneck of such crowd intelligence-based service is data validation as opinion can be biased , influenced by some factor not relevant to the problem in focus .', 'So , in this paper , a data validation framework utilizing machine learning technique for mobile crowdsourcing application is proposed .', 'It is focused on MCS-based road monitoring application .', 'The idea of crowdsourced urban area road monitoring application ( CURMA ) presented in the paper is implemented and result show the crucial need for such data validation framework .', 'GCN2CDD : A Commercial District Discovery Framework via Embedding Space Clustering on Graph Convolution Networks .', 'Modern enterprises attach much attention to the selection of commercial location .', 'With the rapid development of urban data and machine learning , we can discover the pattern of human mobility with these data and technology to guide commercial district discovery .', 'In this article , we propose an unsupervised commercial district discovery framework via embedding space clustering on graph convolution network to solve the problem of commercial district discovery .', 'Specifically , the proposed framework aggregates human mobility feature according to geographic similarity by graph convolution network .', 'Based on the graph convolution network embedding space , we apply hierarchical clustering to mine the latent functional region hidden in different human pattern .', 'Then , with the kernel density estimation , we can obtain the semantic label for the clustering result to discover commercial district .', 'Finally , we analyze the multisource data of the Xiaoshan District and Chengdu City , and experiment verify the effectiveness of our framework .', 'Multistep Traffic Speed Prediction from Spatial-Temporal Dependencies Using Graph Neural Networks .', 'Accurate traffic forecasting on citywide network is one of the crucial urban data mining application that accurately provide congestion warning and transportation scheduling .', 'While previous work has made significant effort to learn traffic temporal dynamic and spatial dependency , two key limitation exist in current model : ( 1 ) most existing approach solely capture spatial correlation among neighbor on predefined graph structure , and genuine relation may be missing due to the incomplete graph connection ; and ( 2 ) existing method are defective to capture the temporal trend because the recurrent and stacking structure employed in these method suffers from the long-range temporal dependency vanquish problem .', 'To overcome the difficulty in multistep prediction and further capture the dynamic spatialoral dependency of traffic flow , we propose a new traffic speed prediction framework for multiscale graph attention network ( MS-GATNs ) .', 'In particular , MS-GATNs is a hierarchically structured graph neural architecture that learns not only the local region-wise geographical dependency but also the spatial semantics from a global perspective .', 'Furthermore , a multiheads attention mechanism is introduced to empower our model with the capability of capturing complex nonstationary temporal dynamic .', 'Experiment on real-world traffic data set demonstrate that MS-GATNs outperforms the state-of-the-art baseline in long-term forecasting .', 'A machine learning-based approach for classifying tourist and local using geotagged photo : the case of Tokyo .', 'In tourism-dependent city , investigating the spatiotemporal distribution and dynamic of tourist flow is crucial for better urban planning in both steady and perturbed state .', 'In recent year , researcher have started relying more on photo-based , geotagged social data , which offer insight about tourist , popular hotspot , and mobility pattern .', 'However , distinguishing between tourist and local from this data is problematic since residence information is often not provided .', 'While previous study rely on heuristic ( e.g.', ', period of stay ) and probabilistic ( Shannon entropy ) approach , this paper proposes a method for classifying tourist and resident based on machine learning ( ML ) algorithms and considering parameter that could explain the variability between the two ( e.g.', ', weather , mobility , and photo content ) .', 'This approach was applied to Flickr user ’ geotagged photo taken in Tokyo ’ s 23 special ward from July 2008 to December 2019 .', 'The result show that stacked ensemble ( SE ) model are superior to model based on five supervised-learning algorithms , including gradient boosting machine ( GBM ) , generalized linear model ( GLM ) , distributed random forest ( DRF ) , deep learning ( DL ) , and extremely randomized tree ( XRT ) .', 'Temporal entropy ( TEN ) , mobility on workday , and frequent visit to amusement venue and crowded place influenced how user were classified .', 'While temporal distribution showed similar monthly/hourly pattern , spatial distribution varied .', 'The proposed approach might pave the way for scholar to carry out future tourism research on different topic and subsequently support policymakers in the decision-making process , specifically in urban setting .', 'A Novel Methodology for Automating Spatio-Temporal Data Classification in Basketball Using Active Learning .', 'The use of machine learning on spatio-temporal datasets has generated significant interest in a range of application , including vehicular traffic modelling and urban planning .', 'One of the most prolific application domain is sport analytics due to the availability of real-world multi-agent datasets , where such technique are used to recognize and predict offensive and defensive strategy in a range of team sport .', 'However , the use of advanced machine learning technique requires the large datasets to be annotated by domain expert , which is a time-consuming task .', 'Active learning is a methodology that significantly cuts down the data-annotation time on large datasets .', 'In this paper , we investigate active learning strategy to annotate spatio-temporal datasets for the purpose of classification model building .', "The proposed algorithms are demonstrated on a dataset obtained from professional basketball game to classify an offensive strategy known as 'Pick-and-Roll ' .", 'Several neural network architecture are investigated for the classification of more than 900 segment of basketball play .', 'The result obtained suggest that the proposed , preferred , methodology is well suited for annotating large spatio-temporal datasets and has the potential to be applicable across a range of team sport and non-sports usage scenario .', 'Urban trip generation forecasting based on gradient boosting algorithm .', 'The four-step transportation model plays an important role in urban planning .', 'The quality of the first phase , i.e .', 'trip generation , determines the performance of the global course .', 'The majority of trip generation forecasting model highly rely on mathematical derivation and have many predictor variable during the prediction , which leads to low accuracy of result and requires laboriously hand-crafted design of input vector .', 'This paper is the first to introduce the gradient boosting decision tree ( GBDT ) algorithm for trip generation prediction , and harmonizes such a powerful machine learning method with traditional urban planning requirement to achieve better prediction performance .', 'Unlike the commonly used linear regression method , GBDT can automatically perform feature selection and model the non-linear relationship between input and output variable .', 'Experimental result on real-world residential travel census in Beijing prove that the GBDT model significantly outperforms the baseline and can forecast the trip generation more accurately .', 'MetaStore : A task-adaptative meta-learning model for optimal store placement with multi-city knowledge transfer .', "Optimal store placement aims to identify the optimal location for a new brick-and-mortar store that can maximize its sale by analyzing and mining user ' preference from large-scale urban data .", 'In recent year , the expansion of chain enterprise in new city brings some challenge because of two aspect : ( 1 ) data scarcity in new city , so most existing model tend to not work ( i.e.', ', overfitting ) , because the superior performance of these work is conditioned on large-scale training sample ; ( 2 ) data distribution discrepancy among different city , so knowledge learned from other city can not be utilized directly in new city .', 'In this article , we propose a task-adaptative model-agnostic meta-learning framework , namely , MetaStore , to tackle these two challenge and improve the prediction performance in new city with insufficient data for optimal store placement , by transferring prior knowledge learned from multiple data-rich city .', 'Specifically , we develop a task-adaptative meta-learning algorithm to learn city-specific prior initialization from multiple city , which is capable of handling the multimodal data distribution and accelerating the adaptation in new city compared to other method .', 'In addition , we design an effective learning strategy for MetaStore to promote faster convergence and optimization by sampling high-quality data for each training batch in view of noisy data in practical application .', 'The extensive experimental result demonstrate that our proposed method leads to state-of-the-art performance compared with various baseline .', 'Interpretation of contextual influence with explanatory tool : Travel mode likelihood mapping using GPS trajectory .', 'Past study have failed to address the spatially and temporally varying impact of environmental factor regarding the uncertain geographic context problem .', "This study seeks to provide an innovative framework to facilitate the understanding of spatially and temporally varying impact of multiple contexts on individual ' travel mode using GIS and machine learning technique .", 'It adopts machine learning technique to create likelihood map to predict the spatiotemporal pattern of individual travel behavior and uses explanatory tool to explore the spatially and temporally varying impact .', 'The most notable change at a local level in the spatial dimension was that assault and offenses involving child turned out to be important in two selected community in Chicago .', 'Regarding the temporally varying impact , battery , other offense , and robbery showed negative association with the walking prediction to some extent at the afternoon peak ( 5–7:59 p.m. ) during weekday .', 'The proposed approach will enable meaningful interpretation of complex interaction between multiple environmental factor and individual travel behavior to suggest policy in urban planning and design .', 'Graph input representation for machine learning application in urban network analysis .', 'Understanding and learning the characteristic of network path has been of particular interest for decade and has led to several successful application .', 'Such analysis becomes challenging for urban network as their size and complexity are significantly higher compared to other network .', 'The state-of-the-art machine learning technique allow us to detect hidden pattern and , thus , infer the feature associated with them .', 'However , very little is known about the impact on the performance of such predictive model by the use of different input representation .', 'In this paper , we design and evaluate six different graph input representation ( i.e .', 'representation of the network path ) , by considering the network ’ s topological and temporal characteristic , for being used as input for machine learning model to learn the behavior of urban network path .', 'The representation are validated and then tested with a real-world taxi journey dataset predicting the tip of using a road network of New York .', 'Our result demonstrate that the input representation that use temporal information help the model to achieve the highest accuracy ( root mean-squared error of 1.42 $ ) .', 'Research on urban anti-terrorism intelligence perception system from the perspective of Internet of thing application .', 'Objective/significance : Based on the urgent need of the status quo of urban anti-terrorism , combining the present situation of intelligent city construction , we carry out the research on the key problem such as the collection and analysis of counter-terrorism information for urban environment .', 'This paper puts forward a kind of city anti-terrorism information perception system based on the Internet of thing , and realizes to improve the level of surveillance and early warning of terrorist activity facing the urban environment .', "Method/Process : The system collect and merges the heterogeneous information of terrorism , which is based on the information perception layer , the intelligence identification layer and the intelligence inference layer , which is based on the city 's focal area .", 'To filter suspicious information by constructing a semantic database of terrorist action signal Combined with complex event processing and machine learning technology , real-time monitoring and mining prediction of mass event flow , using the comparison between historical data of terrorist attack and real-time data , increased the area of counter-terrorism intelligence .', 'Results/conclusions : We hope to provide a better model and an exploratory study on the construction of the counter-terrorism early warning for the urban environment .', 'Applying machine learning and geolocation technique to social medium data ( Twitter ) to develop a resource for urban planning .', 'With all the recent attention focused on big data , it is easy to overlook that basic vital statistic remain difficult to obtain in most of the world .', 'What makes this frustrating is that private company hold potentially useful data , but it is not accessible by the people who can use it to track poverty , reduce disease , or build urban infrastructure .', 'This project set out to test whether we can transform an openly available dataset ( Twitter ) into a resource for urban planning and development .', 'We test our hypothesis by creating road traffic crash location data , which is scarce in most resource-poor environment but essential for addressing the number one cause of mortality for child over five and young adult .', 'The research project scraped 874,588 traffic related tweet in Nairobi , Kenya , applied a machine learning model to capture the occurrence of a crash , and developed an improved geoparsing algorithm to identify its location .', 'We geolocate 32,991 crash report in Twitter for 2012–2020 and cluster them into 22,872 unique crash during this period .', 'For a subset of crash reported on Twitter , a motorcycle delivery service was dispatched in real-time to verify the crash and its location ; the result show 92 % accuracy .', 'To our knowledge this is the first geolocated dataset of crash for the city and allowed us to produce the first crash map for Nairobi .', 'Using a spatial clustering algorithm , we are able to locate portion of the road network ( < 1 % ) where 50 % of the crash identified occurred .', 'Even with limitation in the representativeness of the data , the result can provide urban planner with useful information that can be used to target road safety improvement where resource are limited .', Scale Mobile Signal Data .', 'The human origin-destination ( OD ) flow prediction is of great significance for urban safety control , stampede prevention , disease transmission control , urban planning , and many other aspect .', 'Most of the existing method generally divide the urban area into grid and use vehicle GPS trajectory and metrocard check-in data , combined with machine learning or deep learning model to predict human OD flow .', 'However , these kind of method are challenging to capture fine-grained human mobility pattern .', 'Moreover , these method usually deviate from the actual human OD transfer pattern on a citywide scale due to the particularity of different datasets .', 'To this end , in this paper , we use large-scale mobile phone signal data to achieve human OD flow prediction between the coverage of varying signal base station .', "Many signal base station are distributed in urban geographical space , collecting all the mobile phone user 's location information to obtain large-scale fine-grained unbiased human OD flow data .", 'Due to the lack of natural topology structure between base station , this paper adopts a TGCN model combined with a graph fusion module to pretrain the dynamic population distribution prediction task .', 'The parameter of the graph fusion module are employed to capture the different semantic information in the proposed hybrid machine learning method and finally achieve citywide human OD flow prediction .', 'Extensive experiment on the real-world signal datasets in Changchun , China , demonstrate the effectiveness of our model .', 'AVI 2020 Workshop on Road Mapping Infrastructures for Artificial Intelligence Supporting Advanced Visual Big Data Analysis , AVI-BDA 2020 and 2nd Italian Workshop on downstream application require comprehensive analysis like geographic information retrieval , recommender system , geographic knowledge graphs , and in general , understanding urban space [ 28 ] .', 'Point of Interest ( POI ) , as one of the most researched aspect of urban data , has been successfully modeled using concept borrowed from Machine Learning ( ML ) and Natural Language Processing ( NLP ) .', 'In the work of Place2Vec [ 28 ] , a Word2Vec-like statistical model is proposed to represent spatial adjacency with a continuous embedding space .', 'This method successfully model the functional semantics of POIs with regard to several human-assessment based evaluation .', 'However , though the Place2Vec model addresses the distributional heterogeneity within a given spatial context with ITDL augmentation , it does not address the spatial heterogeneity among different region .', 'To solve this problem , we propose to introduce a hierarchical , density-based , self-adjusting clustering mechanism .', 'The boundary of relatedness and unrelatedness is learned from the given context , where denser area have tighter bound while sparser area have looser one .', 'We train our model on both the baseline Yelp hierarchical dataset [ 28 ] and our OpenStreetMap dataset .', 'We demonstrate that 1 ) our model significantly improves the performance on 2 of the 3 baseline task and the stability of training , and 2 ) our model generalizes excellently across 112 city of radically different scale ( minimum 1725 POIs , maximum 2694070 POIs ) , region ( North America , Europe , Asia , Africa ) and type ( commercial , touristy , industrial , etc . )', 'without the need of adjusting or tuning any hyperparameters .', 'We also demonstrate that our model can be used to discover interesting fact about city like inter-city semantic analogy and intra-city connectivity , which can be very useful in urban planning , social computing and public policy making .', 'Machine learning technology for sustainability in smart city in the post-covid era .', 'The unprecedented urban growth of recent year requires improved urban planning and management to make urban space more inclusive , safe , resilient and sustainable .', 'Additionally , humanity faces the COVID pandemic , which especially complicates the management of Smart Cities .', 'A possible solution to address these two problem ( environmental and health ) in Smart Cities may be the use of Machine Learning technique .', 'One of the objective of our work is to thoroughly analyze the link between the concept of Smart Cities , Machine Learning technique and their applicability .', 'In this work , an exhaustive study of the relationship between Smart Cities and the applicability of Machine Learning area and dimension of sustainability addressed are analyzed , and the Sustainable Development Goals ( SDGs ) are discussed .', 'The main objective is to propose a model ( EARLY ) that allows us to , a case study applied to an Andalusian city is presented .', 'Identifying the Structure of City by Clustering Using a New Similarity Measure Based on Smart Card Data .', 'Identifying the structure of city has long been studied in urban planning and traffic modeling .', 'This study presents a reliable method that reveals the structure of city mainly based on clustering analysis using a new similarity measure .', 'Several previous study have used well-known clustering algorithms in machine learning field , such as k-means clustering based on temporal mobility pattern of region , whereas other study have applied community detection algorithms on network that depict traffic flows .', "However , the former does not reflect spatial interaction among place or area , and the latter group ' place or area with different land uses into the same cluster .", 'To address these issue in existing approach , this study proposes a new similarity method that considers not only temporal mobility pattern of area but also spatial interaction with other area .', 'Moreover , the study combines spectral clustering repeated several time with hierarchical clustering to obtain a reliable structure that keeps the contiguity of cluster and determine the hierarchy of different areal unit .', 'The application of the proposed method to the data for Seoul , South Korea , reveals that the proposed clustering process divides a city into relatively homogeneous area in term of land us .', 'The flow map based on the clustering result also revealed the spatial interaction between different area and identify the polycentric structure of Seoul .', 'Smart urban future : Outlining the smart city planning project .', 'City are constantly evolving complex system , and ongoing digitalization is making them even more complex .', 'The toolkit for urban scientist is expanding with computational method from AI to machine learning , data mining and advanced spatial analysis .', 'Together with vast amount of data of urban phenomenon and new lifestyle emerging from virtuality and cybernetic system , this ‘ smartification ’ makes the planning and analyses more challenging while providing new tool to respond to them .', 'In this article I propose a project for better understanding and guiding the future smart city based on dynamic urban theory such as those studying complex adaptive system , urban morphology , urban economy and mobility system .', 'I argue that we need to carry out empirical research on ongoing change to learn about novel , becoming spatial and functional pattern in the city , and apply both theory and imaginary vision to be able to grasp the likely qualitative transition in human ’ life following the ubiquitous use of technology .', 'The project is built around three coupled module , urban space , mobility and urban economics , and it will be carried out in the city of Tallinn , Estonia .', 'The expected result would help planner , decision maker , urban scientist and developer to better understand the transition we are facing , to be able to support the change and steer it towards better social and economic outcome .', 'Learning geo-contextual embeddings for commuting flow prediction .', 'Predicting commuting flow based on infrastructure and land-use information is critical for urban planning and public policy development .', 'However , it is a challenging task given the complex pattern of commuting flow .', 'Conventional model , such as gravity model , are mainly derived from physic principle and limited by their predictive power in real-world scenario where many factor need to be considered .', 'Meanwhile , most existing machine learning-based method ignore the spatial correlation and fail to model the influence of nearby region .', 'To address these issue , we propose Geocontextual Multitask Embedding Learner ( GMEL ) , a model that captures the spatial correlation from geographic contextual information for commuting flow prediction .', 'Specifically , we first construct a geo-adjacency network containing the geographic contextual information .', 'Then , an attention mechanism is proposed based on the framework of graph attention network ( GAT ) to capture the spatial correlation and encode geographic contextual information to embedding space .', 'Two separate GATs are used to model supply and demand characteristic .', 'To enhance the effectiveness of the embedding representation , a multitask learning framework is used to introduce stronger restriction , forcing the embeddings to encapsulate effective representation for flow prediction .', 'Finally , a gradient boosting machine is trained based on the learned embeddings to predict commuting flow .', 'We evaluate our model using real-world dataset from New York City and the experimental result demonstrate the effectiveness of our proposed method against the state of the art .', 'Recognition of implicit geographic movement in text .', 'Analyzing the geographic movement of human , animal , and other phenomena is a growing field of research .', 'This research has benefited urban planning , logistics , animal migration understanding , and much more .', 'Typically , the movement is captured as precise geographic coordinate and time stamp with Global Positioning Systems ( GPS ) .', 'Although some research uses computational technique to take advantage of implicit movement in description of route direction , hiking path , and historical exploration route , innovation would accelerate with a large and diverse corpus .', 'We created a corpus of sentence labeled as describing geographic movement or not and including the type of entity moving .', 'Creating this corpus proved difficult without any comparable corpora to start with , high human labeling cost , and since movement can at time be interpreted differently .', 'To overcome these challenge , we developed an iterative process employing hand labeling , crowd voting for confirmation , and machine learning to predict more label .', 'By merging advance in word embeddings with traditional machine learning model and model ensembling , prediction accuracy is at an acceptable level to produce a large silver-standard corpus despite the small gold-standard corpus training set .', 'Our corpus will likely benefit computational processing of geography in text and spatial cognition , in addition to detection of movement .', 'Harnessing Social Interactions on Twitter for Smart Transportation Using Machine Learning .', 'Twitter is generating a large amount of 'Automatic identification of the social function of area of interest ( AOIS ) using the standard hour-day-spectrum approach .', 'The social function of area of interest ( AOIs ) is crucial to the identification of urban functional zoning and land use classification , which has been a hot topic in various field such as urban planning and smart city field .', 'Most existing study on urban functional zoning and land use classification either largely rely on low-frequency remote sensing image , which are constrained to the block level due to their spatial scale limitation , or suffer from low accuracy and high uncertainty when using dynamic data , such as social medium and traffic data .', 'This paper proposes an hour-day-spectrum ( HDS ) approach for generating six type of the drop-off point to eliminate the spatial error caused by taxi driver .', 'Next , buffer and spatial clustering were integrated to explore the association between travel behavior and AOIs .', 'Third Districts , Nantong , Jiangsu Province , China .', 'By training 50 AOI sample , six type of standard HDS of residential district , school , hospital , and shopping mall were obtained .', 'Then , 108
